segments.text: It ’ s very kind of you to invite me to dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please sit down and make yourself at home . Please don ’ t stand on ceremony .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad that you like it . This is only the first time that I made it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re great . Could you say it in Chinese ?
segments.speaker: S1
